title: Antiques Dealer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, roleblock a player with a spear. If they intended to visit you, they walk into your pole arm, taking an astral basic attack.
- At night, visit a dead player, gaining 1 Profit. You can’t visit the same grave twice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- None
Item: Katana
- Cost 2
- Uses 1
- Cut Down: Slash a player, dealing a basic attack to them. You shout really loud, revealing all visitors of that player that you used a Katana.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all good players (to appease shareholders)
